Olivier,
could you describe what you do to get this exception? (I.e. did you install/uninstalled/updated plugins in the previous run? Is it reproducible?

It isn't reproducable. I tried to start an existing launching configuration after I switch from 1123 build to I1206 build.
I haven't done anything special.

I got it today again using I20051212-2000. This looks like a timing issue. I waited for a few seconds and started my launching configuration again and it worked.
The problem is that when it fails, it leaves a process in the debug view that cannot be removed. The only way to get rid of it is to restart Eclipse.
Unable to reproduce. Please re-open if this problem starts showing up again.
